body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Right now this is buried in the default constructor, but people may want this list for other reasons

### Describe the solution you'd like

Make the list available

comments.body: Also, just make creating a data converter (and payload converter) with a different encoding payload converter prepended to the default list easier. Maybe something like `temporalio.converter.default().with_encoding_payload_converter(...`.

title: Expose default sequence of payload converters for custom converter creators
